sentence.Network_cn: 他们穷兵黩武，帝国主义色彩浓厚。

sentence.Network_en: An imperialistic country extends its power and influence into neighbouring countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个帝国主义国家将其势力与影响伸展至邻国.

sentence.Network_en: EXTEND An imperialistic country extends its power and influence into neighboring countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 帝国主义国家将它的势力和影响扩展至邻近国家.

PerfectNetExp.abs: you also , my imperialistic friends , have had your ideals and your sentimentalities . one is that the flag shall never be hauled down where it has once floated .赞成帝国主义的朋友们，你们也有你们的理想与原则，其一是，一旦星条旗在某个地方升起就永远不应该降下来；
imperialistic leaders get Great Generals faster than other civs and can also pump out settlers nearly twice as quickly .帝制型的领袖获得伟大将领的速度比其他文明快，而且从居民身上敛财的速度也要快两倍。

list.abs: Drive the Japanese imperialists out of China ., 驱逐日本帝国主义出中国.
In the late 19 th century , many imperialist countries waged invasive against China ., 19 世纪后半叶 , 许多帝国主义国家对中国进行了侵略战争.
In order to oppose imperialist aggression , we must build a powerful navy ., 为了反帝国主义侵略 , 我们一定要建立强大的海军.
... ) imperialism theory 帝国主义论 ) imperialist war 帝国主义战争 ) Anti-imperialistic war thoughts 反帝国主义战争思想.

entry.def: If you describe a country as imperialistic, you disapprove of it because it wants control over other countries.

example.tran: 他们穷兵黩武,帝国主义色彩浓厚。

auth_sentence.content: For only the bourgeoisie could be Imperialistic.
auth_sentence.res_content: For only the bourgeoisie could be Imperialistic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For only the bourgeoisie could be Imperialistic.

auth_sentence.content: That is not quite free trade but it sure goes a long way to punish imperialistic merchantilism.
auth_sentence.res_content: That is not quite free trade but it sure goes a long way to punish imperialistic merchantilism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That is not quite free trade but it sure goes a long way to punish imperialistic merchantilism.

auth_sentence.content: The scale of the effort, extending to an auxiliary show at a palazzo on the Grand Canal, was imperial, if not imperialistic.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scale of the effort, extending to an auxiliary show at a palazzo on the Grand Canal, was imperial, if not imperialistic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scale of the effort, extending to an auxiliary show at a palazzo on the Grand Canal, was imperial, if not imperialistic.
